name: Path of Precision
description: Master the art of precision archery to become
an elite archer of unmatched accuracy.
Train under legendary marksmen and unlock
the secrets of perfect aim and deadly precision.

objectives.accuracy_test: Test of Accuracy: Hit 50 bullseyes in a row
objectives.focus_test: Test of Focus: Hit moving targets blindfolded
objectives.wind_test: Test of Wind Reading: Hit targets in different weather

dialogs.start: The path of precision requires absolute focus and dedication.
dialogs.requirements: Your aim must be perfect. Practice until you never miss.
dialogs.accuracy_trial: Accuracy is not just hitting the target, but hitting exactly where you intend.
dialogs.focus_trial: True archers must trust their instincts even when sight fails them.
dialogs.wind_trial: The wind is not your enemy, but your ally. Learn to read its whispers.
dialogs.complete: Excellent! You have mastered the art of precision archery.
